Chaos_Abstract Animation

#After Effects #Illustrator

Description:

An abstract animation I created for a quote in the book 'One Hundred Years of Solitude' by Gabriel Garcia Marquez. "The past was a lie, that memory has no return." Stop brooding over deeds that can't be undone and yesterdays that can't be re-lived. Live in the moment, enjoying the honest company of friends, peers and lovers.

> Watch Video
